de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.examples.kuka

Class KukaServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.networking.AbstractPsychicServer
      • de.ovgu.softwareprojekt.examples.kuka.KukaServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ButtonListener, ClientListener, ResetListener, OnCommandListener, ExceptionListener, ClientLossListener

    public class KukaServer
extends AbstractPsychicServer
    This is the LBR iiwa control class. It supports two operation modes: joint control, where individual joints may be controlled using the phone pitch, and marble labyrinth control, where only the topmost joints are moved, so a marble labyrinth can be played

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean mIsInMarbleMode
      If true, only the ToolTilter and the ToolArmRotator joints will be used, so as to enable playing a marble labyrinth
      private JointControl mJointControl
      The joint control.
      private MarbleLabyrinthControl mMarbleLabyrinthControl
      The marble labyrinth control
      private Switch mModeDataSwitch
      This is a pipeline splitter that we use to switch between sending the joint control or the marble labyrinth control all data.
      private static int MODE_BUTTON
      This is the button id for the "change control mode" button
      private LbrIiwa mRobotInterface
      The control interface for the robot

      Create a new KukaServer
